main event: A civilian night watchman at Red River Arsenal observed a bright red object moving at a high altitude and speed on 8 June 1954.
interesting points: The object was bright golden yellow in color with no tail and made no noise., It moved in an erratic circular motion and disappeared suddenly., The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes., A possible relation was noted between the object's movement and an explosion of fragmentation cluster bombs occurring at the same time., The watchman was noted as a reliable observer.
witness description: Civilian night watchman at Red River Arsenal
